    • addCustomer

      public static void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Appends a Customer object to the allCustomers list
      Parameters:
      customer - Customer Object

    • setAllCustomers

      public static void setAllCustomers()
      Clears the current list of all the customers in the Java Program and reloads it with a fresh list of all the customers from the database.

    • insertCustomer

      public static void insertCustomer(Customer customer)
      Inserts a given Customer object into customer database table turns Customer object into a List of String Values representing each field. Executes SQL Insert statement for Customer record
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be inserted into the database. Usually received from AddCustomer Controller.

    • updateCustomer

      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer's ID
      newCustomer - Customer Object
      Throws:
      SQLException - Database error

    • selectDivision

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList selectDivision(String country) throws SQLException
      Runs 1 of 3 possible SELECT statements to return the correct divisions for that country
      Parameters:
      country - The country to be considered when selecting the relevant divisions
      Returns:
      the divisions as a list of Strings
      Throws:
      SQLException - for possible database access error

      Returns:
